"Marlu":
"...so that was it, eh?
I think it was a good arrangement."
"...of course, you want to train as a soloist, but you also need to be able to cooperate. That's what it is to be ARKS."

"...alright, let's go back for a bit.
Once we're back, come give me a report at my place."

"……こんなところね。
いい案配だったと思う。"

"……単騎での実力研鑽はもちろん
連携能力を高めるのも必要。
アークスのつとめ、だから。"

"……それじゃ、一度戻りましょう。
帰還したら、私の所まで報告に来て。"
